function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Heterogeneity in the indirect effects of residential density on COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting and managing the impact of residential density on COVID-19 mortality at a national level","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted studies to understand the specific factors contributing to heterogeneity and develop localized interventions","Technologies":"Data analytics, GIS mapping tools","People":"Population residing in areas with varying levels of residential density","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Spatial agglomeration patterns contributing to lower indirect effects in specific counties","Impact":"Unequal distribution of risk and impact related to residential density on COVID-19 mortality","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health strategies in areas with lower indirect effects to mitigate the impact of residential density","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, public health intervention models","People":"Residents of counties with lower indirect effects","Owner":"Local public health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Heterogeneous patterns in the indirect effects of auto-oriented accessibility and street connectivity on COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Challenges in understanding and addressing the impact of built environment factors on COVID-19 mortality","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed research to identify the factors contributing to heterogeneous patterns and develop tailored strategies for different regions","Technologies":"Urban planning models, public health data analysis tools","People":"Populations living in areas with varied auto-oriented accessibility and street connectivity","Owner":"Urban planners, public health agencies"}]}
